constituent: delusion, deceased, perish, top hat, fishhook, woman
heisigStory: The "ideal woman" one daydreams about is no more than a delusion. Hence, perish the thought of her.
koohiiStory1: I had a problem with remembering that "deceased" went over the "woman". So, here´s my story: The delusional woman was carrying her deceased husband on her back.
koohiiStory2: If you think you should perish for that woman, you have a major delusion.
myStory: mù quáng. tin vào điều sai. người phụ nữ tin vào điều sai.
readingExamples: 妄信 (もうしん), 妄想 (もうそう), 迷妄 (めいもう)
